EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS partner that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: RS Partner - 30% Funds Disbursed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
BlueWave has disbursed the first 30% of {!Opportunity.Name}'s Solar Loan . Please contact a member of our Customer Care team if you do not receive these funds within 5 business days.
Please remember that in order to receive the next 60% disbursement, you will need to upload mechanical completion documentation. These documents can be uploaded here.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
